HotReload.name: HOT RELOAD
HotReload.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>On pickup, add 3 <c=card>Basic Shots</c> and a <c=card>Basic Block</c> to your deck.</c>

PatchNotes.name: PATCH NOTES
PatchNotes.description: EXE cards can produce pre-upgraded cards.

PersonalData.name: PERSONAL DATA
PersonalData.description: On pickup, choose 1 card from each crew member to upgrade.

SmallWormhole.name: SMALL WORMHOLE
SmallWormhole.description: On pickup, gain 1 of 4 common artifacts from a character not in your current crew. Gain an EXE card for the owner of the chosen artifact.

description.None: Attack for 2. Add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Basic Shot</c> to your hand.
description.A: Attack for 2. Add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Basic Shot</c> with <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> to your hand.
description.B: Attack for 2. Add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Basic Shot B</c> to your hand.

description.None: Choose a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> card in any pile. Make a copy of it.
description.A: Choose a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> card in any pile. Make a copy of it.
description.B: Choose a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> card in any pile. Make an upgraded copy of it.

browseTitle.copy: Choose a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> card to make a copy of.
browseTitle.copyAndUpgrade: Choose a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> card to make an upgraded copy of.
